articles.author: Jayesh Shinde
articles.title: Early Detection To Faster Treatment & Care, How AI Is Helping Us Fight Against Deadly Diseases
articles.description: Early detection of disease is a huge problem in India, so is adequate number of caregivers. All this puts a lot of pressure on doctors to do more. Now cutting edge artificial intelligence is coming to the help of doctors by assisting them in non-critical work.
